meanings.definition: A unit of loudness level for sound, equal to 40 decibels.
meanings.sent1: The music was too loud, reaching 80 phons.
meanings.sent2: The sound engineer adjusted the volume to 40 phons.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed at 40 phons, demanding attention.
meanings.sent4: The thunder roared at 40 phons, shaking the windows.
meanings.sent5: The alarm blared at 40 phons, waking up the entire neighborhood.

meanings.definition: A unit of loudness level for sound, equal to 40 decibels.
meanings.sent1: At 40 phons, the conversation was clear and easy to hear.
meanings.sent2: The classroom noise level was kept at 40 phons for optimal learning.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped at 40 phons, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The rain fell softly at 40 phons, lulling me to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The TV was set at 40 phons, providing background noise while I worked.

meanings.definition: A unit of loudness level for sound, equal to 40 decibels.
meanings.sent1: The movie theater maintained a volume of 40 phons for the film.
meanings.sent2: The alarm clock rang at 40 phons, waking up the sleepyhead.
meanings.sent3: The baby cried at 40 phons, signaling hunger to the parents.
meanings.sent4: The car engine hummed at 40 phons, a soothing sound during the drive.
meanings.sent5: The phone notification beeped at 40 phons, alerting the user of a message.
